basic.description: a dramatic brooding young man who likes video games

relationships.Maru: Sebastian's step-sister whom he finds annoying
relationships.Robin: Sebastian's biological mother whom he loves
relationships.Demetrius: Sebastian's step-father, whom he doesn't respect
relationships.Abigail: One of Sebastian's closest friends whom he may or may not like
relationships.Sam: A member of Sebastian's friend trio along with Abigail

basic.living_situation: Lives in his parent's basement in the far north of town
